title: ГIБДД i т.д
overview: This is a story about the work of an ordinary traffic police department (the old-fashioned way of saying - GAI) of one of the administrative districts of Moscow. The life of a "traffic cop" is full of events of various natures: dramatic, lyrical, sometimes even tragic, but more often, fortunately, comedic. The series will show the life and work of the traffic police department, through the prism of which the characters, experiences and aspirations of ordinary people, ordinary citizens of Russia working in this "unusual ordinary" profession are refracted. She left her mark on each of them. In someone, she emphasized the best qualities, someone pushed to develop all the worst.The plot is based on the story of the senior duty officer Ogoshkov, who, because of his love for the girl Inga, finds himself drawn into criminal machinations. His fellow traffic cops will have to solve these crimes. The series will have a place for chases, and romantic encounters, and personal dramas, and real men's actions.
